content: this little bee is about 8 inches from stinger to antenna the pattern is worked up from the bottom the body and head are made in one piece with the antennae and wings attached separately written using u s crochet terms the pattern is a pdf and you will need adobe reader to open it this program is free to download feel free to contact me if you need any help you will need approx 70g yellow worsted weight size 4 yarn small amount of black crochet hook in size 3 75 tapestry needle polyfil or preferred stuffing 12mm safety eyes stitch marker embroidery thread for eyebrows you will need to know how to use a magic_ring single_crochet and how to increase and invisible decrease i include instructions for the invisible decrease you can sell any items made from this pattern in a small capacity you cannot share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please link back to the pattern and my blog listed below when you are selling finished items whether on etsy instagram facebook or any other social media or place online just respect my rights as the designer thank you
